heading: HB07885
0: AN ACT IMPOSING A SIX-YEAR MORATORIUM ON THE INCREASE OF ALL GOVERNMENT FEES AND CHARGES
status: Pending with the Committee on WAYS AND MEANS since 2018-07-30
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07885
FULL TITLE : AN ACT IMPOSING A SIX-YEAR MORATORIUM ON THE INCREASE OF ALL GOVERNMENT FEES AND CHARGES
ABSTRACT : Aims to suspend all increases for fees and charges for all services imposed by the national and local government for a period of six (6) years.
ALIAS NAME : “Iwas Dagdag Singil sa Serbisyo ng Gobyerno Act.”
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : VARGAS, ALFRED D.
DATE FILED : 2018-06-27
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON WAYS AND MEANS ON 2018-07-30
